Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Maxar Space Systems addresses a broad spectrum of needs for our customers, including mission systems engineering, product design, spacecraft manufacturing, assembly, integration, and testing. With more than 60 years of experience, we design and manufacture satellites and spacecraft components for communications, Earth observation, exploration and on-orbit servicing and assembly.

Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: We generate and send cars and related orders based on this document: https://github.com/tech-greedy/singularity/blob/main/getting-started.md.
Project.Please share a sample of the data (a lin: Pre and post event high-resolution satellite imagery in support of emergency planning, risk assessment, monitoring of staging areas and emergency response, damage assessment, and recovery. These images are generated using the Maxar ARD pipeline, tiled on an organized grid in analysis-ready cloud-optimized formats.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, North America
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: Cloud storage (i.e. S3), HTTP or FTP server, IPFS, Shipping hard drives
